website_summaries.verdict: A top-selling Clinique mascara that lives up to its name by making lashes look twice their normal size. Ideal for anyone who prefers a volumizing mascara formula.
pros: Formulated to plump up lashes for a thick faux-lash look
Brush has a tapered design that enables it to reach tiny inner lashes
Brush design is also ideal for coating the lower lashes
Buildable, very black, and not likely to clump or flake
cons: Tendency to smudge under the eyes, especially on oily skin
Some users with very straight lashes say it doesn't hold curl

customer_reviews.title: Favorite mascara.
customer_reviews.text: I have thick black long lashes, but I like to use mascara anyway usually for an extra pretty effect. I don't want clumping at all. I don't want to worry about black specs or smudges on my face. After decades of trying a great many mascara types and several expensive, this is my favorite by far because it immediately with only one layer makes my lashes look pretty and long and separate and healthy and naturally so. There is no clumping. I never find mascars specs on my face. I love this.
customer_reviews.author: Trutti

customer_reviews.title: No recommended
customer_reviews.text: This mascara is supposed to be a great one! After one month it’s so cakey and Thick, I really can’t apply it. It has never been exposed to any extreme temperatures. It was good the first week or so, and slowly became so cakey I could barely get of off the brush to use. I’m really disappointed, as Clinique has always had quality products. I want Amazon to refund my account! This product had to be old, or used!!
customer_reviews.author: K Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara on the market
customer_reviews.text: IThank you for offering g this product on Amazon. This is the absolute best mascara I have ever used( and I am the queen of mascara)Separates & thickens each lash to look like you have twice the amount of lashes. I recently had a stroke and can not get to the cosmetic counter at the mall-made my day myto find it offered on Amazon. If you tried it here’s your chance. you will Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Frani Casteel

customer_reviews.title: It makes my eyelashes look longer and thicker🤩
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara. Now let’s get real people, this is not magic. It works on your own lashes, so if you have none this wont help you. This is just to make eyelashes that are already there, a little more fuller. I had been asked if my lashes were fake when wearing this mascara. However, Im a person who already has a good set of eyelashes/eyebrows.
customer_reviews.author: RomiNation

customer_reviews.title: I really like this product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I don't like the over-done clumpy look and this product does not give that. It gives a nice long, full, natural look with minimal application. When I take it off, there is less mess b/c you can use less product to achieve results. However, you could surely apply a lot of it to achieve a thick, dramatic look. That's just not my thing.
customer_reviews.author: KLA77

customer_reviews.title: Like no other!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Clinique mascara and won't buy any other. It stays put even if you have oily lids and still washes off easily when you want to remove it. I read some of the reviews and I think this is a standard size mascara (I've always purchased name-brand mascara and they are normally this size). I also believe the product contains a higher quality of ingredients and considering it goes so close to the eyes it is worth the price. This particular retailer/seller was prompt in shipping and the product was what I was expecting to receive.
customer_reviews.author: Sweets_87

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I try different mascaras all the time but I keep going back to Clinique. This one is the best in their line that I have tried. The wand is easy to get to all the tiny lashes and I look like I am wearing falsies! The best thing is it does not shed and leave black flecks everywhere. I will stick to this one from now on.
customer_reviews.author: CGB

customer_reviews.title: Not like department store purchase.
customer_reviews.text: It does not go on lashes as well as one's I purchased in department stores.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Makeup
customer_reviews.text: For me, I personally love this mascara. Granted different things work for different people. It makes my eye lashes more full looking. It stays on great. I'd recommend this to anyone. Of course, this is just my experience with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Person1

customer_reviews.title: Does it compare to Macy's Department store,  get it from the same retailers as Macy's'?s?
customer_reviews.text: I used it for eyelashes (mascara dk. blk), The product number was the same as the one I bought at Macy's but it was the light green tube instead of the dark green tube. I wanted the dark green tube and I liked it much better. The light green tube is the one you receive with Macy's free gifts along with there cosmetic bag.
customer_reviews.author: pauline siebol

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute worst mascara I have ever used. I usually use kkw black but it's out of stock. So I thought this would be like the next best thing. Wowwwww how wrong was I???? Doubling mascara???? That's a joke. I've used mascara from the dollar store that works better than this garbage. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: ~Crystal~

customer_reviews.title: mascara of choice always
customer_reviews.text: Perfect mascara. I don't live near a department store so it's easy and convenient to order from here.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Poler

customer_reviews.title: The best feeling mascara I've ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: The best feeling mascara I've ever purchased. When you touch your lashes they feel soft and silky, not rough like other brands, and I have used a lot of expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: Tamar Gotshall-Maxon

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I like the product, it is not clumpy and its much better than expected. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shellee Smith-Mink

customer_reviews.title: Great mascara!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara. It’s the best. I have naturally long lashes, but they aren’t very dark. This mascara goes on smoothie without clumping and the lashes stay separated nicely.
customer_reviews.author: J Wilk

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it but couldn’t
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it looks but it is brutal on the eyes! I bought this mascara for myself and two friends - all three of us were shocked at how much this burns the eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Holland

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I normally love Clinique products but this one is horrible. The shipping was the only thing good, as in the fastness. This mascara does not create long thick lashes and runs down your face if you get a drop of water on your eyes (that means tears, sweat, humidity) I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Mascara
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a good mascara and have spent tons of money. So far this is the best I've tried. Of course I will continue to look.
customer_reviews.author: Maria R. Marthaler

customer_reviews.title: Arrived frozen
customer_reviews.text: Ordered in the winter. Bad idea. Mascara was completely frozen when it arrived. I will never order in the winter again. It was loose and becsme trashed immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Tveit

customer_reviews.title: It's like putting water on your eyelashes.
customer_reviews.text: This mascara does nothing...at least for me. I won't purchase it again. The Clinique mascara in the black tube is much better than this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Allison A. Nicol

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy
customer_reviews.text: Brush too small, it takes many many applications to make it look like you have lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Test

customer_reviews.title: Mascara
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive my Clinique mascara. The lash doubling in black. It was not in my package with the two other items. Thank u. Judy Wall
customer_reviews.author: Judy Wall

customer_reviews.title: Not high quality
customer_reviews.text: Does not elongate lashes. It's black and that's about it
customer_reviews.author: Karen Connelly

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: After a couple of hours I had black under eyes. Does not stay on lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Roskopf

customer_reviews.title: My favorite mascara
customer_reviews.text: Love this mascara. Lengthens and adds volume. No problems with smudging, which is one of my worst complaints with most mascara's. Will by this line of mascara again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Caudle

customer_reviews.title: It comes off and I'm like a panda
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't add any benefit, but it comes off really quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Natsumi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it- this is easy on and easy off. doubles the lenght of my lashes!
customer_reviews.author: Jflstyle

customer_reviews.title: opened package
customer_reviews.text: My daughter didn't want to use it--the package was opened. It was a gift for her.
customer_reviews.author: Marti

customer_reviews.title: Status
customer_reviews.text: I got something completely different and did not get mascara I sent back whatever I got back! I just got an email saying you have not received this and I sent this a while ago?
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Empty tube
customer_reviews.text: The tube of mascara was empty. No make up in it. Highly dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Kristan Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara fir sensitive eyes
customer_reviews.text: The only mascara that I can find that doesn’t irritate my eyes!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Lash Extender!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome mascara! It extends and thickens my lashes which have grown thin as I have aged. This is my mascara for life
customer_reviews.author: Ally B

customer_reviews.title: Mountain Consumer
customer_reviews.text: I really miss this mascara as Clinique isn't carrying it anymore and their replacement mascara doesn't seem to give you the longer, separated lashes.
customer_reviews.author: super shopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great mascara, wears well and washes off easily at night
customer_reviews.author: KC bookreader

customer_reviews.title: Great Mascara Wand
customer_reviews.text: The mascara wand has a Christmas tree shape which makes it extremely easy to apply and efficient in it's coverage. Also, Clinique mascara is well tolerated by my overly sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Zimri-Lim1761

customer_reviews.title: My favorite mascara!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara. I'm allergic to a lot of other mascaras (something that developed over time) but this one doesn't irritate my eyes at all. It goes on smooth and doesn't get dry and clumpy over time.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hijjeh

customer_reviews.title: Clumpy and smeary. Not what I expected for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Clumpy and smeary . Not what I expected for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Janet L. Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Favorite New Mascara!
customer_reviews.text: I never use a full tube of mascara before it seems to clump on me--so far I haven't had that problem with this one. It provides a nice-looking eye lash without being overly dramatic during the day. I also have sensitive eyes and this has not caused the normal irritation I get from other products. This may be a few dollars more expensive, but in this instance it is well worth it to me!
customer_reviews.author: Florida Horse Girl

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed---wrong color
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize until I used the mascara that it was brown and not black. Very disappointed because it was too late to send back or get refunded. Learned my lesson,,,, will check all of my orders carefully to avoid losing money
customer_reviews.author: C S

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Mascara
customer_reviews.text: Small town, our department store that carries Clinique went out of business. Resorted to ordering online. I have been wearing this mascara from Clinique for several years. Love it! Does not smudge.
customer_reviews.author: Marie in Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Very good mascara for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very good mascara for the price. Doesn't run and stays put all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne S. in Coos Bay, OR

customer_reviews.title: Dried out.
customer_reviews.text: I do npt know what happened to this mascara. Usually Clinique is perfect, But this one was not. Because of the pandemic I'm unable to return it. My loss.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy D.

customer_reviews.title: works well for me
customer_reviews.text: Does not clump nor flake. This mascara does coat individual lashes well. It increases the appearance of thickness of your eyelashes, yet looks natural.
customer_reviews.author: Lori M

customer_reviews.title: Love this mascara
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara! I’ve been using it for years. Arrived so quickly and everything was great!!!
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this mascara!!! It was everything I expected and more!!
customer_reviews.author: karen Powers

customer_reviews.title: Seems fake
customer_reviews.text: This product simply doesn’t lengthen or thinker lashes. It’s as if it’s mixed with water.
customer_reviews.author: S. Roth

customer_reviews.title: The best yet
customer_reviews.text: This product has always been my go to. .. The brush is thin and fine. It separates lashes to distribute product perfectly. I will use this mascara forever!
customer_reviews.author: MegB

customer_reviews.title: Actually DOESN'T clump
customer_reviews.text: I've always bought drug store mascara and they all clump- even though they all say "no clumping." This is the first mascara I've ever used that actually doesn't clump. Love that! Worth the extra cost to me.
customer_reviews.author: Derri Smith

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very messy to apply, flakes often and irritates your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Justice

customer_reviews.title: My favorite mascara. Only downside is that it tends to ...
customer_reviews.text: My favorite mascara. Only downside is that it tends to do the "raccoon eyes" thing as the day goes on - but it's nice because it doesn't irritate so tradeoffs are worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ady

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff if you are sensitive to make up
customer_reviews.text: I am sensitive to make up and I have been using this brand for over 20 years now. Makes it really convenient to buy this on Amazon now! Great stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie CollinsTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Clinique offer a very good line of products and this mascara is no exception.
customer_reviews.author: Veronicat

customer_reviews.title: Clinique Lash Doubling Mascara
customer_reviews.text: great eyelash mascara; really love it; will buy only this brand
customer_reviews.author: karina214

customer_reviews.title: Tried and true
customer_reviews.text: Love clinique products and this is no exception. Goes on deceptively watery but dries fast. No raccoon eye after my 12 hour work days.
customer_reviews.author: Lally P

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: i've tried lots of mascara, but this is my favorite, i have very thin & short eyelashes, but this mascara really makes them looks long and thick
customer_reviews.author: cammie

customer_reviews.title: this is my favorite.
customer_reviews.text: I'm picky about the mascara I use. So far, this is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: EmilyArt

customer_reviews.title: Clinique mascara is always good.
customer_reviews.text: I have used Clinique mascara for a long time, and no other mascara stands up to it. It doesn't clump and it seems to last a long time. I would recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: More brown than black
customer_reviews.text: This is more brown than black but overall a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Bynon

customer_reviews.title: Color?
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't specify color. I unfortunately didn't pay attention, and ordered this item, and received item in Black/ Brown. I wrongfully assumed it was BLACK.
customer_reviews.author: themakeupgirlfriend

customer_reviews.title: Good, classic mascara
customer_reviews.text: I don't know about "lash doubling" but this is a classic mascara that does exactly what mascara should. It's also one of the few mascaras I can find that doesn't stain under my eyes. Goes on nicely and comes off like it should, and it does last all day. Cost a couple dollars more on Amazon than retail price, but worth it to forego a trip to the mall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sample size!
customer_reviews.text: $20 for a sample size mascara is unreasonable. I don't recall seeing that it was a sample size in the description of the product.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hallock

customer_reviews.title: Try it, you will like it.
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it is smear free and goes on so smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Norma L Poe

product_meta.title: Clinique Clinique Lash Doubling Mascara, 01 Black, 8ml/0.27oz
feature_bullets: Lash Doubling Mascara - # 01 Black was launched by the design house of Clinique
It is recommended for casual wear
